name: A-Sock-Ellipse Now!
summary:
The third compilation/main disc in the Pac-Guy series, a follow up to ''Vengeance or Bust'', featuring three this time 3-D games made by other developers, 2 of which are in another genre. It includes: 
 
-The Magic Land (A turn /Tile based Stragety RPG) 
-The Secret of Coolness (A traditional pea-guy style game in 3D) 
-Defeating Dr. Robotica (A first person shooter) 
 
It also has a video/movie called ''The Search for Kodoe'', and some other extras.
